title: Darenimo Himitsu no Koimonogatari
original_name: だれにもひみつの恋物語
sinopse:
Cheese! anthology with one-shots from various mangaka.

1. Hoshi sae mo Nemuru Yoru [Kitagawa Miyuki]
2. No Panties Musume [Shimaki Ako] - also included in Boku ni Natta Watashi vol.2
3. Tomodachi Shikkaku [Kasuga Akane]
4. Koi no Neiro [Yumachi Shin]
5. Yuuwaku Lesson Itashimasho [Sakurada Hina]
6. Platonic Porno [Yamada Komomo]

(Source: MU)
